content: Is there anyway to get rustc to print the llvm stats? i.e. these things https://llvm.org/docs/ProgrammersManual.html#the-statistic-class-stats-option?
It looks other tools end up printing them from llvm_shutdown() but rustc doesn't seem to call that
Yeah, I don't see a way either. Would be a nice feature to add. A caveat though is that it requires an assertion-enabled build, so it's not something most people would be able to use.
